org.xchain.namespaces.core

Class FilterChooseCommand.WhenClause

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.impl.FilterChainImpl
      • org.xchain.namespaces.core.FilterChooseCommand.WhenClause
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Chain, Command, Filter
    Enclosing class:
    FilterChooseCommand

    @Element(localName="when",
         parentElements=@ParentElement(localName="filter-choose",namespaceUri="http://www.xchain.org/core/1.0"))
public abstract static class FilterChooseCommand.WhenClause
extends FilterChainImpl

    filter-choose commands can have one or more when commands nested in it. The first when command whose test evaluates to true will be executed.

    • Method Detail

      • getTest

        @Attribute(localName="test",
           type=JXPATH_VALUE)
public abstract java.lang.Boolean getTest(org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context)

        The test for this when clause. If the test evaluates to true, then the when clause is executed. If the test evaluates to false, then the next when or otherwise command in the filter-choose will be tested.
